verse.name: v1
verse.lines: The greatest Love that anyone could ever know newline That overcame the cross and grave to find my soul newline And til I see You face to face newline And grace amazing takes me home newline I'll trust in You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: With all I am I'll live to see Your kingdom come newline And in my heart I pray You'll let Your will be done newline And til I see You face to face newline And grace amazing takes me home newline I'll trust in You

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: I will live to love You newline I will live to bring You praise newline I will live a child in awe of You

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: You are the voice that called the universe to be newline You are the whisper in my heart that speaks to me newline And til I see You face to face newline And grace amazing takes me home newline I'll trust in You

verse.name: b1
verse.lines: You alone are God of all newline You alone are worthy God newline And with all I am newline My soul will bless Your name
